EmailTemplate.description: Email to partners - Duke Energy Rebate + PDF REVISED
EmailTemplate.name: 18-03 N.C. Rebate Email Fixed Version
EmailTemplate.subject: Correction: Now's the Time to Go Solar in North Carolina!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Do you want share this message with your customers?
Click here to download a PDF version.
Are you interested in receiving future collateral from us to distribute to your customers?
Please contact marketing@bluewavesolar.com to discuss shared collateral and co-branding opportunities.
Are you interested in partnering with us? If so please contact jotis@bluewavesolar.com.
Thank you for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere! - All of us here at BlueWave
